CompanyDescription: Unless otherwise indicated, the terms "Aegion Corporation," "Aegion," "the Company," "we," "our" and "us" are used in this Report to refer to Aegion Corporation or one of our consolidated subsidiaries or to all of them taken as a whole. We are incorporated in the State of Delaware. We maintain executive offices at 17988 Edison Avenue, Chesterfield, Missouri 63005. Our telephone number is (636) 530-8000 or toll free at (800) 325-1159. Our website address is www.aegion.com. Our common shares, $.01 par value, are traded on The Nasdaq Global Select Market under the symbol "AEGN". Our fiscal year ends on December 31 of each calendar year.
